attributes.action: treat older people with dignity by, inter alia, paying proper inflation linked pensions, compensating in full (including inflation links) for occupational pensions lost as a result of govenrment misinformation and maladministration and paying in full care costs for which people have contributed for all of their working lives.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The goivernment agenda seems to be to penalise older people by talking away their entitlements whilst at the same time paying increased benefits to assylum seekes, single parents and civil servants.   People are now being made paupers, having worked and paid contributions and taxes all their lives, because of government ageism.
